title: How To Do Kdp Keyword Research - Amazon KDP Paperback Publishing (Money Makers)
description:
How To Do Kdp Keyword Research - Amazon KDP Paperback Publishing (Money Makers)

If you're having problems figuring out a niche you want to watch this video. When I think of niches on Amazon KDP I think of keywords, interiors, and covers. Keywords on Amazon are the money makers for your business. That's one of the ways to get your book sale over and over.

How do I find keywords for your niche on Amazon Kindle Direct Publishing?

The best way to do it is the free resources you have in front of you! Amazon is the best way to do keyword research in my opinion but then you have tools that you can use to make sure the data is correct. The tools will help you understand what you're looking at when it comes to search volume. You want to make sure your keywords have search volume. This is how you make the money baby!!

When it comes to keyword research make sure you write all of your keywords down and research them.

If you have any questions please let me know! Keep winning all day!
